Title: Hollow Man
Writer: Gary Scott Thompson (story), Andrew W. Marlowe (story), Andrew W. Marlowe (screenplay)
Actors: Elisabeth Shue, Kevin Bacon, Josh Brolin, Kim Dickens
Plot: When the leader of a team of scientists volunteers to be the test subject for their experiment in human invisibility, he slowly unravels and turns against them, with horrific consequences.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 11 nominations.
